abilityEffect.en: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Frost Rotom's type is [W] until the end of your turn.

effect.en: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each [C] Energy in the Defending Pokémon's Retreat Cost (after applying effects to the Retreat Cost).
